text: South India is often used to refer to the states and territories in the southern part of the Republic of India. In general, one of the following is meant: *Andhra Pradesh *Telangana *Karnataka *Kerala *Tamil Nadu *Lakshadweep, a group of Islands, and union territory *Puducherry or Pondicherry, another union territory made up of city states along the coast. Category:Regions of India Its a diverse region with many cultures and people
title: South India
